ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Quickstrike: He was right. There was something going on. Just as he asked what it was, Dark Mouse walked out of him. He glowered a little, and decided to wait

Quickstrike:



He was right. There was something going on. Just as he asked what it 
was, Dark Mouse walked out of him. He glowered a little, and decided 
to wait for her to return. He sat down in the commander's chair in 
the bridge. He waited for minutes, but his patience was thin.

He jumped up and walked down to Dark Mouse's location, to someone's 
quarters. He leaned up against the frame of the door with his hip, 
glaring with his bright crimson optics.

"Hey! Ya wanna fill me in or not?" he said over to her.
